divs: Sighting Detailsive seen this object from time to time, it appears to rotate and flsh colors. As it hovers in the distance it appears to "dance" up and down, slowly, then zooms east. I thought it was a planet, then a helicopter, but now i know it isnt, because both of those objects cannot move like that. I was in bed and saw this object out of my window, i noticed it as i was about to go to sleep. It just didnt look right. But then it disappeared and then i went to bed. I will try to take pictures next time.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Stockholm
There were no other sightings in Stockholm on or around November 8th 2007
